meanings.definition: Of or relating to a solution having the same osmotic pressure as some other solution.
meanings.sent1: The isotonic solution had an equal osmotic pressure as the other solution.
meanings.sent2: The nurse administered an isotonic IV solution to the patient.
meanings.sent3: The isotonic drink kept the athletes hydrated during the game.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like an isotonic solution in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The isotonic relationship between the two countries ensured peaceful coexistence.
